channel.title: Npc Problem
channel.description:
I have this problem with all of my npcs
they wont drop the items i asked for them to drop i put them in drops.cfg and when i kill an npc it either stays where it is (with 0 hp) or it disappears or slowly dissolves 15% of the time i need help on how to make my npcs die and drop items all the time
thanks ;)
